sentence.Network_en: The biggest festival of all is the International Eisteddfod held every year in Llangollen.
sentence.Network_cn: 最盛大的节日是国际艺术家年会,每年一次在克莱德的兰高仑举行.

entry.tran: 威尔士诗歌音乐节;威尔士诗歌音乐比赛会
entry.def: An eisteddfod is a Welsh festival at which competitions are held in music, poetry, drama, and art.

means.word_mean: 1. any of several annual Welsh festivals involving artistic competitions (especially in singing)
